original_text: and there he built an altar and called the place El-bethel, because there God had revealed himself to him when he fled from his brother.
korean_text: 그가 거기서 제단을 쌓고 그 곳을 엘벧엘이라 불렀으니 이는 그의 형의 낯을 피할 때에 하나님이 거기서 그에게 나타나셨음이더라

sentences.original_text: and there he built an altar
because there God had revealed himself to him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그곳에서 자신을 그에게 나타내셨기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: when he fled from his brother
